title: Update contact details in the Contact section

requirements.summary: Update the contact information text (address, phone, email) displayed in the ContactSection component to the new user-provided values while preserving the existing layout, styling, and form
acceptanceCriteria: The ContactSection displays the user-specified contact details (address, email, phone, or other fields as provided).
All existing form fields (name, email, message) and submit button remain unchanged.
The AuraFlora pastel styling and layout of the contact section are preserved.
No other sections are affected by this change.

file_operations.description: Update the static contact information text (studio address, phone number, email) displayed in the ContactSection component to the new values that will be provided by the user. Keep all existing form logic, controlled inputs, submission handler, loading states, and styling intact. Only modify the hardcoded contact detail strings in the contact information display area.
